mapper.select: select * from buy_bid where item_num=#{item_num} and buy_num=#{buy_num}
select * from sell_bid where item_num=#{item_num} and buy_num=#{sell_num}
select * from item order by item_num
select buy_size, buy_wishprice, count(*) as count from buy_bid where item_num = #{item_num} group by buy_size, buy_wishprice order by buy_inputday desc
select sell_size, sell_wishprice, count(*) as count from sell_bid where item_num = #{item_num} group by sell_size, sell_wishprice order by sell_inputday desc
select b.buy_size, p.purchase_total_price, p.purchase_date from purchase p join buy_bid b on b.buy_num = p.buy_bid_num where p.item_num=#{item_num}
select purchase_total_price from purchase where item_num=#{item_num} order by purchase_date desc limit 1
